typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Rk as string,
		Player as string,
		Pos as string,
		Age as string,
		Tm as string,
		G as string,
		GS as string,
		MP as string,
		FG as string,
		FGA as string,
		{FG%} as string,
		{3P} as string,
		{3PA} as string,
		{3P%} as string,
		{2P} as string,
		{2PA} as string,
		{2P%} as string,
		{eFG%} as string,
		FT as string,
		FTA as string,
		{FT%} as string,
		ORB as string,
		DRB as string,
		TRB as string,
		AST as string,
		STL as string,
		BLK as string,
		TOV as string,
		PF as string,
		PTS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> NBAPlayerStats
